title: RYHS CHATHAM cdbox-font
content:
Hi, im looking for a font like this. Doesn´t have to be exactly this one, but something down that lane. And what are the name of this “style”? condensed?

Thanks again!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [angel01.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060255/http:/typophile.com/files/angel01.jpg) | 49.41 KB |

 [‹ Neo Sans SC](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060255/http:/typophile.com/node/41764 "Go to previous forum topic") [Arnell Group wide sans caps ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060255/http:/typophile.com/node/39612 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Mathias

comments.content: Btw: Is there a Non-American Gothic, too? ;°)

Probably not. But just Gothic sounds like Heavy Metal Blackletter to me.  
Gothic Sans maybe?

Well, that would imply the existence of a [Gothic Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060255/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=serif+gothic&site=d&sample_text=Ooops!), wouldn’t it? ;—)

[Okay, okay, I’ll stop the hairsplitting. I understand what you mean.]
